title: Git & GitHub
desc: Learn version control, branching, merging, GitHub workflow, and collaboration.

title: GitHub Actions
desc: Automate builds, tests, and deployments using GitHub Actions pipelines.

title: Jenkins
desc: Set up CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins, manage jobs, agents, and deployments.

title: Docker
desc: Learn containerization, Dockerfiles, image creation, and container orchestration.

title: Kubernetes
desc: Deploy scalable apps using Kubernetes pods, deployments, services, and clusters.

title: Prometheus
desc: Monitoring and alerting system for metrics-based infrastructure.

title: Grafana
desc: Visualize metrics data and build dashboards for system performance.

title: Terraform
desc: Provision and manage cloud infrastructure using Terraform IaC.

title: AWS
desc: Learn EC2, S3, IAM, Lambda, RDS, VPC, and cloud deployment fundamentals.

title: Google Cloud
desc: Deploy and manage resources on Google Cloud Platform.

title: Microsoft Azure
desc: Build, deploy, and scale apps using Azure cloud services.

title: Ansible
desc: Automate deployments, configuration management, and server provisioning.

title: ELK Stack
desc: Analyze logs using Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana.

title: Nginx
desc: Web server, reverse proxying, load balancing, and performance optimization.

title: Apache
desc: Learn HTTP server setup, virtual hosts, and backend routing.

title: SonarQube
desc: Improve code quality with static code analysis and pipeline integration.

title: DevSecOps
desc: Security automation, SAST, DAST, secrets management, and zero-trust.

title: Bash Scripting
desc: Automate repetitive DevOps tasks using shell scripting.
